name: SelectBackdrop
description:
An overlay displayed beneath the menu popup.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

keepMounted.description: Whether to keep the HTML element in the DOM while the select menu is hidden.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-closed.description: Present when the select is closed.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the select is animating out.

data-open.description: Present when the select is open.

data-starting-style.description: Present when the select is animating in.
